markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Shoanti Name-Bearer](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=111)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 118 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Saga Lands

</column>

You are a member of a Shoanti quah and have gone through its coming of age ceremony, gaining the traditional tattoo of your quah and earning your adult name.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) skill, and the [Quah Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Combat Climber](/Feats.aspx?ID=768) skill feat.
name: Shoanti Name-Bearer

text: Shoanti Name-Bearer Source World Guide pg. 118 2.0 Region Saga Lands You are a member of a Shoanti quah and have gone through its coming of age ceremony, gaining the traditional tattoo of your quah and earning your adult name. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Athletics skill, and the Quah Lore skill. You gain the Combat Climber skill feat.
